string.name: about_licence_origin
string.p: This project is heavily based on the original LnkShortener project. Thanks Michael Achmann for your hard work! Visit his GitHub page here.
This application uses Open Source components. We acknowledge and are grateful to these developers for their contributions to open source.

resources.string: The QR code functionality is powered by QRGen, which is licensed under Apache 2.0
The Android robot is reproduced or modified from work created and shared by Google and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 3.0 Attribution License.
The material QR-Code button was made by Austin Andrews @Templarian
Translated to Japanese by naofum, to Chinese by eallion and to German by michaelachmann.
Run the first-time setup in order to signup with 1t1.nl or add your custom server data.
One to One Link Shortener Setup

Welcome to One to One Link Shortener! Before you can shorten your first link you will quickly need to run this setup. LnkShortener shortens URLs by using a web-service. You can use the default shortening-service 1t1.nl for free or enter information of your own Polr-Server. If you have never heard of Polr choose 1t1.nl.
I want to use my own Polr-Installation
How do you want to use One to One Link Shortener?
I want to keep my settings
I hereby agree to the Terms of Service (TOS) for using 1t1.nl
I want to login or sign up
You can use 1t1.nl anonymously or sign-up. If you create a user account you can access analytics on 1t1.nl websites.
An error occurred. Please try again later.
Testing API-Key failed. Please try again.
API-Key not accepted by server. Please check the entered API-Key.
Cannot connect to API. Please check the URL.
"Setup creates a unique API-Key for 1t1.nl. If you don\'t run setup before %s you will not be able to shorten links anymore."
Your API-Key has expired, you need run setup before you can shorten any more Links.
